mapper.select: SELECT OP_CODE "OPCODE" , OP_TITLE "TITLE" , TO_CHAR(OP_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "STARTDATE" , TO_CHAR(OP_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "ENDDATE" , TO_CHAR(PA_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "PADATE" , MEM_CODE "MEMCODE" FROM MEMBER M JOIN OPEN_PROJECT OP ON M.MEM_CODE = OP.OP_MEM_CODE JOIN TEAM_JOB TJ ON OP.OP_CODE = TJ.TJ_OP_CODE JOIN PART_APPLICANT PA ON TJ.TJ_NO = PA.PA_NO WHERE M.MEM_CODE = #{memCode}

SELECT OP_MEM_CODE "MEMCODE" , OP_CODE "OPCODE" , OP_TITLE "TITLE" , TO_CHAR(OP_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "STARTDATE" , TO_CHAR(OP_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "ENDDATE" , TO_CHAR(OP_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "OPDATE" FROM OPEN_PROJECT WHERE OP_MEM_CODE = #{memCode}
